description: This table contains the X-Ray information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: XRAY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The X-Ray device type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: XRAY_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The area applied.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: XRAY_AREA_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality of the area.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: XRAY_DEVTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of X-ray.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: XRAY_DAP
columns.description: The Dose Area Product (DAP) for the x-ray machine (in Gray square centimeters).

columns.name: XRAY_RESULT_TIME
columns.description: The length of time it takes for radiology to return x-ray results to the surgeon.

columns.name: XRAY_AIR_KERMA
columns.description: This item stores the X-Ray Air Kerma.
